name: VIR-132.03 Verify that the content admin can delete restriction for the desired customizations.

userStory.narrative:
As a content administrator I would like to be
able to create a uniform brand for vicro.com that
enables customizations to the layout and branding via
restrictions and individualized content management decisions.

title: VIR-132.03 Verify that the content admin can delete restriction for the desired customizations.
